# scene

**Instance Property**

The scene currently presented by this view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var scene: SKScene? { get }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`.

You call [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKView/presentScene(_:)] to assign a value to this property.

## Displaying a Scene

- **presentScene(_:)**: Presents a scene.
- **presentScene(_:transition:)**: Transitions from the current scene to a new scene.
- **SKTransition**: An object used to perform an animated transition to a new scene.
